definition: Ho Chi Minh (1890-1969), former Vietnamese leader/see also 胡志明市[Hu2 Zhi4 ming2 Shi4]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam

sentences.english: Ho Chi Minh Museum. Main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明博物馆的正门口。

sentences.english: New, clean and comfortable for a very good price in HCMC.
sentences.chinese: 在胡志明市合适的价格可以享受到全新，干净和舒适。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Ho Chi Minh City on CX.
sentences.chinese: 国泰航空公司来回香港至胡志明市机票。

sentences.english: Best Chinese Seafood & Hotpot restaurant in New Saigon City Centre Phu My Hung area.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明市新城区富美兴最好的中餐海鲜火锅酒家。

sentences.english: I a heading back to Los Angeles today at around 4pm here in HoChiMinh City.
sentences.chinese: 我今天下午4点从胡志明市回到了洛杉矶。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Siem Reap on VN.
sentences.chinese: 越南航空公司来回胡志明市至暹粒机票。

sentences.english: The incident in photos shot by Binh Minh 02's guardian ships.
sentences.chinese: 在胡志明市的平阳02的守护船拍摄照片的事件。

sentences.english: He and Ho Chi-Minh, out there alone, in a shoot-out.
sentences.chinese: 他和胡志明两个人打的你死我活。

sentences.english: The ho chi minh trail was hacked through jungles covering the southern half of laos .
sentences.chinese: 所谓胡志明小道是在老挝南部的密林中开辟出来的。

sentences.english: Northern Vietnam was ruled by Ho Chi Minh while Southern Vietnam was governed by Ngo Dinh Diem.
sentences.chinese: 北部由胡志明领导，而南部由吴庭艳统治。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Ho Chi Minh City on VN.
sentences.chinese: 越南航空公司来回香港至胡志明市机票。

sentences.english: 1946 - Ho Chi Minh is elected the President of North Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 1946年的今天，胡志明被选为北越的总统。

sentences.english: Roundtrip economy class air ticket for HKG and Ho Chi Minh City on Cathay Pacific Airways.
sentences.chinese: 国泰航空公司来回香港至胡志明市经济客位机票乙张。

sentences.english: In the third part of our series on Vietnam, we switch the focus to a slum area of Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 专题第三集，镜头来到越南胡志明市平新郡的贫民区。

sentences.english: Sipsongchutai was included as a part of Northern Vietnam under the administration of Ho Chi Minh.
sentences.chinese: 锡朴乌台成为胡志明领导下的北越的一部分。

sentences.english: Big money is being made in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 河内和胡志明市正在创造巨大财富。

definition: Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976
pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
